name: Food Expert
description: Specialized in translating food-related content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for culinary terms, ingredients, cooking techniques, and food-related content.
author: immersive

zh-CN.name: 美食
zh-CN.description: 美食术语库，包含烹饪术语、食材、烹饪技巧相关术语的中文翻译。

zh-TW.name: 美食
zh-TW.description: 美食術語庫，包含烹飪術語、食材、烹飪技巧相關術語的繁體中文翻譯。

en.name: Food Expert
en.description: Specialized in translating food-related content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for culinary terms, ingredients, cooking techniques, and food-related content.
